label: uncl8457
comment: Code specifying the reason for excess transportation.

values.label: Special rail car order, schedule increase forecast change
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to special rail car order, schedule increase forecast change.

values.label: Engineering change or late release
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to engineering change or late release.

values.label: Specification (schedule) error/overbuilding
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to special rail car order, schedule increase forecast change specification (schedule) error/overbuilding.

values.label: Shipment tracing delay
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to shipment tracing delay.

values.label: Plant inventory loss
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to plant inventory loss.

values.label: Building ahead of schedule
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to building ahead of schedule.

values.label: Vendor behind schedule
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to vendor behind schedule.

values.label: Failed to include in last shipment
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to failure to include costs in last shipment.

values.label: Carrier loss claim
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to carrier loss claim.

values.label: Transportation failure
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to transportation failure.

values.label: Insufficient weight for carload
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to insufficient weight for carload.

values.label: Reject or discrepancy (material rejected in prior shipment)
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to reject or discrepancy.

values.label: Transportation delay
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to transportation delay.

values.label: Lack of railcar or railroad equipment
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to lack of railcar of railroad equipment.

values.label: Releasing error
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to releasing error.

values.label: Record error or cate reported discrepancy report
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to record error or cate reported discrepancy report.

values.label: Common or peculiar part schedule increase
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to common or peculiar part schedule increase.

values.label: Alternative supplier shipping for responsible supplier
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to alternative supplier shipping for responsible supplier.

values.label: Direct schedule or locally controlled
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to direct schedule or locally controlled.

values.label: Purchasing waiver approval
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to purchasing waiver approved.

values.label: Authorization code to be determined
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to authorization code to be determined.

values.label: Pilot material
values.comment: The reason for the excess transportation is due to pilot material.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
